CAUTION: I have discovered a bug that effectively ruins your colony, so be careful.

When building a structure with a forklift or a palette very close, make sure your astronaut has to walk some distance before placing down the crate. Failure to do so may cause the completed structure to spawn not where you tell it, but rather on top of the forklift/palette. If its on a palette, you can destroy it but you lose all but one of the crates. If it is on a forklift it cannot be destroyed and is usually misaligned to the building snap grid, generally causing bad times.

Hi everyone, I'm the developer for Sol 0. I noticed I was getting a bit of traffic from over here, so I figured I would stop by. I'm a huge Kerbal fan (if you couldn't tell from a few of the influences in the game...), so it's cool that Sol 0 is getting a bit of notice over here. Sol 0 is still in beta - still a few bugs and honestly a bit less refined than Kerbal's beta. That said, I am updating frequently with bug fixes and am now trying to hit a two-week or so update schedule. The bug noted above is fixed for the next update.

Sol 0 was Greenlit back in early December, and I'm planning on releasing on Steam in early 2015, so if early access isn't your thing, the full 1.0 release is on the horizon!
